oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George Montgomery and Taina Elg visit to West End High School, Nashville, Tennessee, 1959
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured left to right: Hollywood actress Taina Elg, Nashville Mayor Ben West, actor George Montgomery and an unidentified man on stage at West End High School. Both celebrity actors were awarded Honorary Citizenship of Nashville in 1959 at the school. They also co-stared in the MGM film “Watusi,” released the same year. Montgomery was an American painter, sculptor, wood craftsman and stuntman who is best known as an actor in western style film and television. He was married to American singer, actress, and television personality Dinah Shore. Taina Elg, a famous Finnish-American actress and dancer has appeared on stage, television, and in film. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
